price: Noah said, “My Lord, they have disobeyed me and followed those whose wealth and children did not increase them except in loss[7].
arabic: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
footnotes: [7] i.e., the lowly people among them followed their wealthy chiefs.
